text: The second inauguration of George Washington as President of the United States took place in the Senate Chamber of Congress Hall in Philadelphia on March 4, 1793. The inauguration was the beginning of the second term of George Washington as President and John Adams as Vice President. It was the first presidential inauguration to be held in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Category:1793 in the United States Category:George Washington Washington, George Category:1790s in Pennsylvania Category:18th century in Philadelphia
title: Second inauguration of George Washington
